NOTES:

EG (6/5/2001 3:46:32 AM)
	our code should not have special knowledge of "aux". The code should handle
	the exception it gets from the OS.
	This is a corner case that will be rare defer.

EG (7/12/01 12:46:27 PM)
	there is now a name validation routine provide by the workbench that we should use.

MA (31.07.2001 17:13:00)
	where can I find this method?

There seems to have been a change in the core; Now you get an error dialog 
saying:
Creation of element failed.
Reason: Core Exception: aux is a reserved name on this platform

Closing
